name: Fruit Rush (PixeledNerd)
description:
Fruit Rush- 2D Platformer

Help the players collect all the delicious fruit while avoiding traps and obstacles.

Instructions

  • Use the left and right arrow keys or "a" and "d" to move
  • Use the Space bar to jump
  • Click the Settings button on the start screen to control the music and SFX

Currently Under Development

I understand I spelled "coming" wrong on the start screen but I have no intention of fixing it right now. The SFX slider also does not work. It will be fixed.

Note

 Please keep in mind that the game may take a few seconds to load, but it will.
